_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate common UI component text. These are generic, reusable across the app.
_meta.note: Keep these short and universal. They're used throughout the entire application.

appName: Your application name. This should come from brand.name config ideally. Ex: 'TaskFlow', 'AI SaaS', 'YourProduct'

actions.loading: Generic loading state text. Keep it short. Ex: 'Loading...', 'Please wait...', 'One moment...'
actions.save: Button text to save changes. Ex: 'Save', 'Save Changes', 'Update'
actions.saved: Success message after saving. Ex: 'Saved successfully', 'Changes saved', 'Updated!'

accessibility.skipToContent: Skip link for keyboard navigation. Standard a11y text. Ex: 'Skip to main content', 'Skip to content'

states.empty: Generic empty state text when no data. Ex: 'No data available', 'Nothing here yet'
states.error: Generic error message. Ex: 'Something went wrong', 'An error occurred'
states.noResults: When search returns nothing. Ex: 'No results found', 'Nothing matched your search'

confirmation.areYouSure: Confirmation dialog heading. Ex: 'Are you sure?', 'Confirm action'
confirmation.confirm: Button to confirm destructive action. Ex: 'Confirm', 'Yes, proceed', 'I'm sure'
confirmation.cannotUndo: Warning that action is irreversible. Ex: 'This action cannot be undone', 'This is permanent'
